text:
I'm worried. The CompStat numbers are due
tomorrow at 9 a.m., but at this rate, we

won't be finished until your daughters are
grown and married.
I may have a solution.
We need to CompStat the office.

What is CompStat? It's just using data to
identify problem spots in a neighborhood.

Now, I have been taking notes on points of
friction in this office for years.

The red areas are places where no work gets
done.

If we can fix these problems without anyone
knowing what we're doing, we will finish on

time. Are you saying you want to secretly
perform scientific experiments on your

friends and coworkers to increase
efficiency?
Yes. Sounds fun.

Let's do it. Okay, so I've already taken
care of a few obvious problems.

I moved the toaster to the break room far
away from Boyle.
Good. What's this red area here?
The Diaz triangle.

Right. So you know about Rosa's anger
incidents?
It's my birthday. I hate birthdays.

If you wish me a happy birthday, I will
punch you.
You're a funny
little bird, Diaz. Happy birthday.

Oh. Anytime Mount Diaz erupts, everyone in
the squad avoids her.
Mount Diaz humorous.

Yes. Tell me what room is just down the hall
from her desk.
The bathroom.

If people are afraid to walk by Diaz,
bathroom breaks will be to a minimum.

Hey, Diaz, I just need to make sure I've got
the details right in this file.
Yeah, guy was passing bad checks.
But
is this the same guy? Yeah.
The name here is the same
name on the car.
Okay. All right. Thank you, thank you.
Got it.
Come on.

Come on. I'm so sick of these sucky
computers.
God. One more step and your next.
All right.
Let's move on to your unpaid parking tickets.
Dude. Dude, fire!
Oh, my. Fire!
Hey! Fire!
Whoa!
Whoa! I got okay, here we go, here we go.
You got it. Ooh, ooh.
What happened? Scully?
I didn't know there was a toaster there.
Why is the toaster there?
Oh, my fringe, my beautiful fringe!
I'm on fire!
Extinguishers empty.
Morons! Whoa whoa whoa!
Back to the drawing board.
Sir, I'm begging you.
Please, we have to stop.
Boyle is still smoldering.

The problem is, we didn't take Peralta into
account in our next trial.
Um.
Hello, boys.
Welcome to your own office.

I hear you're trying to make the precinct
more efficient.

Gina, what are you doing in the captain's
chair?

Please, I'm open to any ideas about
efficiency.

I've narrowed the problem down to one
location.
The Holt Jeffords vortex.

Things would go a lot faster if the two of
you did less experimenting and more working.
And I'm not the only one who thinks that.
You melted my fringe.
You think I have an anger problem?
I don't, you are both dead to me.

Well, I suppose it's possible we may have
been a tad enthusiastic in our pursuit of
efficiency. Really?
A tad Icarus.
Fine. Message received.
Jefferson and I will get right to work.
Great. That will be all.
Thank you.
Get the hell out of my chair.
I pushed it a little bit on that one.
Okay, bye.
